snippet: A gunman shot and critically wounded a guard at the Census Bureau headquarters on Thursday before leading the police on a chase that reportedly ended with the suspect and an officer wounded.
abstract: Unidentified gunman shoots and critically wounds guard outside United States Census Bureau headquarters in Washington, DC, suburb of Suitland, Md, before being shot down by police during chase.
lead_paragraph: A gunman shot and critically wounded a guard at the Census Bureau headquarters on Thursday before leading the police on a chase that reportedly ended with the suspect and an officer wounded.

headline.main: Maryland: Census Bureau Guard Is Critically Wounded
headline.print_headline: Maryland: Census Bureau Guard Is Critically Wounded
